entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:08 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -39.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gjoa Haven Airport 8:00 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -39.6°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Visibility: 14.5 km
Humidity: 61 %
Wind Chill: -54
Dewpoint: -44.3°C
Wind: NE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 43. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 43. Wind chill near minus 59. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 6:35 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 38. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries later in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming west 20 late in the morning. High minus 38. Wind chill minus 59 in the morning and minus 53 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 6:35 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 39. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 55 in the evening and minus 50 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 6:35 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023
